title: Merge pull request #1 from bdiegel/dev
message:
Merge pull request #1 from bdiegel/dev

updates for release 1.1

title: version code now generated by gradle build
message: version code now generated by gradle build

title: allow touch anywhere on screen to roll; update info activity
message:
allow touch anywhere on screen to roll; update info activity

- InfoActivity is now an AppCompatActivity
- appbar has been replaced by toolbar
- color palette adjusted

title: prettify html and js
message:
prettify html and js

- display app name and version identifier in html

title: update CCL library
message:
update CCL library

- CLL api changes
- use AppCompatActivity
- use ContextCompat to load drawables
- update layout, fix fonts and use new theme

title: Added feature image
message:
Added feature image

This includes the source SVG drawing and the production PNG image.

title: Fix for proguard deprecation
message:
Fix for proguard deprecation

- runProguard was deprecated
- use minifyEnabled

title: load signing info dynamically from properties file
message: load signing info dynamically from properties file

title: proguard rules to remove log statements
message: proguard rules to remove log statements

title: fixed namespace url and version info
message: fixed namespace url and version info

title: Do not reinitialize activity on orientation change
message: Do not reinitialize activity on orientation change

title: Initial commit of ChromeCast dice roller
message: Initial commit of ChromeCast dice roller
